resources.string: Anonymous 10 second videos posted around you
No screenshots allowed. All videos are destroyed 24 hours after being uploaded
Each user is identified with a random four letter handle
Videos you upload or comment on get added to \"My Feed\"
Users with the most coins unlock the Yonder Captain upgrade. They can use coins to remove videos and comments
Uploading a video initially generates 10 coins. You collect an additional coin for every like and lose a coin for every dislike you get on all the videos and comments you post
